events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue reported involves a refund request related to an incorrect product size sent to the customer.
Assigning refund case to agent Sarah T. for prompt handling and resolution.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789, and I have not used the jacket; it is still in the original plastic wrapping.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately once you ship the jacket back using the prepaid label we'll send you.
Great, thanks for the quick help. I appreciate the prepaid label to simplify the return process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund to the original payment method. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to make sure the refund was received properly and if you need any further assistance from us.
Closing this case now since the refund was successfully completed and no further requests were received.
